text: فالقى عصاه فاذا هى ثعبان مبين

translations.translation: So He threw down his staff and there it was, unmistakably a snake.
At this Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it became a live serpent.
Thereupon Moses threw his rod, and suddenly it was a veritable serpent.
So Moses threw down his staff and suddenly it turned into a real serpent.
Therefore Moosa put down his staff – it immediately turned into a visible python.
Then [Musa] threw his staff and behold! it was a [Thu`ban] serpent, manifest!
So he threw his rod, then lo! it was a clear serpent.
So he cast his staff; and behold, it was a serpent manifest.
Then he flung down his staff and lo! it was a serpent manifest;
Then Moses threw down his staff and suddenly, unmistakably, it appeared as a serpent,
Thereupon he cast down his rod, when, lo it was a serpent manifest.
Thereat he threw down his staff, and behold, it became a manifest python.
Then (Moses) threw his rod, and behold! it was a serpent, plain (for all to see)!
Then [Musa (Moses)] threw his stick and behold! it was a serpent, manifest!
He threw down his staff, and it was clearly a serpent.
So he threw his staff, and it was an apparent serpent.
So Moses threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent, manifest.
[7:107] Then he cast down his staff and lo! it was a serpent, manifest [for all to see], an enormous snake.
(Then he flung down his staff) the first token (and lo! it was a serpent manifest) a yellow, male serpent: a huge one;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ } وهو الذَّكرُ مِن الحيَّاتِ




وقوله تعالى:

[طه: 22] معناه من غَيرِ مَرضٍ

translations.translation:
And His saying, {There is no god but He, the Clear Truth}, and He is the All-Knowing from the [worlds of] the living.

And His saying, {Exalted is He}, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [one] of the arrogant?"


This means "without illness."

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ثم لما سمع موسى قوله وشاهد عتوه واستكباره { فَأَلْقَىٰ } بإلهام الله إياه { عَصَاهُ } من يده على الأرض بين أيديهم { فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعْبَانٌ } بلا معالجة واستعمال أسبابٍ كما يفعل السحرة { مُّبِينٌ } [الأعراف: 107] عظيم ظاهر بأضعاف مقادر العصا




روي أنه لما ألقاها صارت ثعباناً أشقر، فاغراً فاه بين لحييه ثمانون ذراعاً، وضع لحاه الأسفل على الأرض والأعلى على سور القصر، ثم توجه نحو فرعون فهرب منه وأحدث، وانهزم الناس مزدحمين، فمات منهم خمسة وعشرون ألفاً، فصاح فرعون: أنشدك بالذي أرسلك خذه وأنا أؤمن بك وأرسل معك بني إسرائيل، فأخذه فعاد عصاً
